Live Stream Unknown 1.Open the Video Feature from option to capture the Live Recording of CCE. 2.Make sure you have opted the maximum resolution available before commencing the live stream. 3.Adjust or select an appropriate magnification ratio so that it would not intervene with the recording. 4.Try to cover different areas within the CCE plot to see the progress of the persons engaged. 5.Mount or Fix the camera to assure that there will not be any issue of shaking or blocking the camera while streaming the live video.
